parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="60" y="1550" width="897.5" height="1230" as="geometry"> <mxRectangle x="60" y="1540" width="130" height="30" as="alternateBounds" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="6iqIt3PB_psb0txRrDh2-128" value="<font style="font-size: 14px;">In the profile service, we decided to use&nbsp;<b>MongoDB </b>due to a range of benefits it offers. MongoDB stands out for its horizontal scaling, <br>replication support, as well as the dynamism and flexibility of its schema.<br>&nbsp;We particularly highlight the ability to add various attributes for entities, facilitating adaptation to changes and the specifics of our project.</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="6iqIt3PB_psb0txRrDh2-113" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="7.5" y="90" width="870" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="6iqIt3PB_psb0txRrDh2-129" value="<b><font style="font-size: 14px;">PROFILE - SERVICE</font></b>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="6iqIt3PB_psb0txRrDh2-113" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="362.5" y="50" width="160" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="6iqIt3PB_psb0txRrDh2-130" value="<b><font style="font-size: 14px;">NOTIFICATION - SERVICE</font></b>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="6iqIt3PB_psb0txRrDh2-113" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="342.5" y="170" width="200" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="6iqIt3PB_psb0txRrDh2-131" value="<font style="font-size: 14px;"><b>ACCOMMODATION - SERVICE</b></font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="6iqIt3PB_psb0txRrDh2-113" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="328.75" y="290" width="230" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="6iqIt3PB_psb0txRrDh2-134" value="<font style="font-size: 14px;"><b>AUTH - SERVICE</b></font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="6iqIt3PB_psb0txRrDh2-113" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="372.5" y="630" width="140" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="6iqIt3PB_psb0txRrDh2-137" value="<font style="font-size: 14px;"><b>MongoDB </b>impresses with its dynamic and flexible schema, crucial for the Accommodation service<br>&nbsp;that can encompass diverse data about accommodations. Additionally, MongoDB provides us with the advantage<br>&nbsp;of fast data write and read capabilities.</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="6iqIt3PB_psb0txRrDh2-113" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="77.5" y="330" width="730" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="6iqIt3PB_psb0txRrDh2-138" value="<font style="font-size: 14px;">We use <b>Redis </b>as a cache service for images to enhance performance and speed up access to images in our system.<br>&nbsp;Redis is excellent for this purpose due to its ability for quick data caching in memory.<br>&nbsp;This in-memory data storage system allows us immediate access to images without the need for frequent access to long-term data sources.<br>&nbsp;Furthermore, Redis offers us the option to set time constraints (TTL - time-to-live) for the cache, ensuring the update<br>&nbsp;of images in line with their real-time relevance.</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="6iqIt3PB_psb0txRrDh2-113" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-2.5" y="390" width="890" height="100" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="6iqIt3PB_psb0txRrDh2-139" value="<font style="font-size: 14px;">For image storage, we employ the <b>Hadoop Distributed File System (HDFS)</b> due to its capability to efficiently handle<br>&nbsp;large volumes of data and high resilience to errors. This technology is particularly suitable for cases where we have<br>&nbsp;substantial amounts of data, such as high-resolution images, requiring reliable and efficient storage.</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="6iqIt3PB_psb0txRrDh2-113" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="68.75" y="490" width="750" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="LJfzg_11p4KgD-sNEu9C-20" value="<font style="font-size: 14px;">For event sourcing, we will use <b>Cassandra </b>as the event store database because it can handle a large volume of data <br>and offers fast write and read capabilities.<br>&nbsp;Since collecting and displaying statistics does not require modifications or deletions, Cassandra is well-suited for our needs.</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="6iqIt3PB_psb0txRrDh2-113"> <mxGeometry x="67.5" y="556" width="790" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="6iqIt3PB_psb0txRrDh2-132" value="<font style="font-size: 14px;"><b>RECOMMEDATION - SERVICE</b></font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="6iqIt3PB_psb0txRrDh2-113" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="330" y="987" width="220" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="6iqIt3PB_psb0txRrDh2-135" value="<font style="font-size: 14px;"><b>RATING - SERVICE</b></font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="6iqIt3PB_psb0txRrDh2-113" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="365" y="1107" width="150" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="6iqIt3PB_psb0txRrDh2-133" value="<font style="font-size: 14px;"><b>RESERVATION - SERVICE</b></font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="6iqIt3PB_psb0txRrDh2-113" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="340" y="781" width="200" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="6iqIt3PB_psb0txRrDh2-141" value="<font style="font-size: 14px;">For reservation management, we use <b>Cassandra </b>due to its ability for fast distributed processing of time-sensitive data,<br>&nbsp;such as specific reservation details. Cassandra enables horizontal scaling and quick key-based searches, ensuring efficiency in this context.</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="6iqIt3PB_psb0txRrDh2-113" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-2.5" y="817" width="890" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="6iqIt3PB_psb0txRrDh2-142" value="<font style="font-size: 14px;">On the other hand, for tracking accommodation availability and prices, we utilize <b>MongoDB </b>because of its<br>&nbsp;flexible schema and capability for efficient managementof complex data structures. MongoDB allows fast read and write operations,<br>&nbsp;facilitating dynamic updates of information regarding accommodation availability and prices.</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="6iqIt3PB_psb0txRrDh2-113" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="20" y="867" width="840" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="6iqIt3PB_psb0txRrDh2-143" value="<font style="font-size: 14px;">This integrated approach combines the strengths of both systems,<br>&nbsp;providing an optimal solution for the specific requirements of reservation management</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="6iqIt3PB_psb0txRrDh2-113" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="162.5" y="927" width="560" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="6iqIt3PB_psb0txRrDh2-144" value="<font style="font-size: 14px;"><b>Neo4j </b>is used in a recommendation service due to its graph database, allowing the modeling of<br>&nbsp;connections between users, accommodations, and their interactions. The graph model facilitates the analysis of similarities<br>&nbsp;between users and provides personalized recommendations based on their behavior. Neo4j also supports path analysis in the graph and<br>&nbsp;efficiently handles complex relationships, making it an optimal tool for building effective recommendation systems.</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="6iqIt3PB_psb0txRrDh2-113" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="7.5" y="1017" width="870" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="6iqIt3PB_psb0txRrDh2-145" value="<font style="font-size: 14px;"><b>MongoDB </b>is the ideal solution for our accommodation and host rating system because it allows adaptation to different types of ratings.<br>&nbsp;The universal schema facilitates tracking different aspects, while fast read and write performance ensures fresh<br>&nbsp;and dynamically updated information. Linking ratings to other entities enables us to analyze user behavior more deeply,<br>&nbsp;and data replication provides reliability and high availability at all times.</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="6iqIt3PB_psb0txRrDh2-113" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="17.5" y="1137" width="860" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="6iqIt3PB_psb0txRrDh2-140" value="<font style="font-size: 14px;"><b>MongoDB </b>is well-suited for our authentication service due to its flexible schema, fast data read and write capabilities,<br>&nbsp;and support for JSON-like documents.&nbsp;This combination allows us to efficiently log user activities, track logins and registrations,<br>&nbsp;and quickly verify user authenticity. Additionally, MongoDB's support for indexing and complex queries provides us with deeper<br>&nbsp;insights into data and enables efficient management of user information.</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="6iqIt3PB_psb0txRrDh2-113" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="20" y="670" width="810" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="6iqIt3PB_psb0txRrDh2-136" value="<div style=""><span style="font-size: 14px; background-color: initial;">Horizontal scaling, provided by <b>MongoDB</b>, enables us to easily expand capacity to handle increased loads in the Notification service.</span></div><font style="font-size: 14px;"><div style=""><span style="background-color: initial;">&nbsp;MongoDB stands out for its dynamic and flexible schema,</span></div><div style=""><span style="background-color: initial;">&nbsp;which is crucial for the Notification service that may involve diverse data about notifications.</span></div></font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" div.font:
We use Redis as a cache service for images to enhance performance and speed up access to images in our system.
Redis is excellent for this purpose due to its ability for quick data caching in memory.
This in-memory data storage system allows us immediate access to images without the need for frequent access to long-term data sources.
Furthermore, Redis offers us the option to set time constraints (TTL - time-to-live) for the cache, ensuring the update
of images in line with their real-time relevance.
